Public Class CustomFunctions

Public ReadOnly Property Callme(ByVal a As Integer, ByVal b As Integer) As Integer                Get        

    Return Product(a, b)

End Get       

End Property

Private function Product(a as integer, b as integer)

 return a * b

end function

End Class
